The '''Night's Watch archer''' is a minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]].Â He is a member of the [[Night's Watch]] and appears in the episode "[[The Watchers on the Wall]]". He is played by [[Neil Marshall]], the director of this episode.Â
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===
He along with his brothers participated in the [[Battle of Castle Black|defense of the Wall]] from the attacks of the [[wilding]] army and attacked them with flaming arrows on the orders of [[Jon Snow]].<ref>"[[The Watchers on the Wall]]"</ref>
